post.summary: Update cant_access flag for voters matching ward and exact address
post.description: Updates the `cant_access` field for all voters that match the provided `ward_no_id` and exact `address`. Authentication required.

post.summary: Update ward and address for voters matching ward and exact address
post.description: Finds voters by `ward_no_id` and exact `address` and updates their `ward_no_id` and `address` to new values.
